```{r}
library(nullabor)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

d <- lineup(null_permute("mpg"), mtcars)
head(d)
attr(d, "pos")
qplot(mpg, wt, data = d) + facet_wrap(~ .sample)

x <- rnorm(100)
y <- x+runif(100,-1,1)
dat <- data.frame(x,y)
d <- lineup(null_permute("y"),dat)
attr(d, "pos")
qplot(y, x, data = d) + facet_wrap(~ .sample)
```
